ygData.subject: RE: Question about the Battle Drum
ygData.msgSnippet: Its common knowledge and well tested. Some of the most respected Bards on EQ did exhaustive tests after this item was discovered. As far as where can you see
ygData.messageBody:
Its common knowledge and well tested. Some of the most respected Bards on EQ
did exhaustive tests after this item was discovered. As far as where can you
see the #s, this all happened several months ago, and it was the talk of the
Songs of Norrath bulletin board for quite some time.

-----Original Message-----
From: JasonF [mailto:JasonF@...]
Sent: Wednesday, August 11, 1999 1:34 PM

Subject: Re: [eqbards] Question about the Battle Drum


From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>

Chris,

Where did you find this data on the drum?
